name: in.visible people
description:
#3 - streets of salvador

invisible people in metropole, demonstrate the inequalities and lack of empathy. 

the dynamics of salvador city the first capital of brazil, its architectural structures and its miscegenated people are portrayed in photos and videos from the perspective of those who were raised there.

the blackest city outside africa, salvador is the portrait of all the inequality generated by a slave colony.

salvador - bahia - brasil - 2015
